title: Tokyo Paralympics 2020: day one – in pictures | Sport
content:
Tokyo Paralympics 2020: day one – in pictures | Sport

Tokyo Paralympics 2020: day one – in pictures

The best images from the first day’s action in Tokyo, including cycling, fencing, swimming, table tennis and wheelchair rugby

Main image: Sarah Storey of Great Britain breaks the world record in the 3,000m individual pursuit Photograph: Alex Whitehead/SWpix.com/Rex/Shutterstock

  • Britain’s Sarah Storey celebrates with her cycling gold

    Photograph: Alex Whitehead/SWpix.com/REX/Shutterstock

  • Table tennis athlete Alexa Szvitacs of Hungary in action

    Photograph: Iván Alvarado/Reuters

  • Britain’s Jamie Stead falls to the floor after being tackled in a wheelchair rugby match against Canada

    Photograph: Alex Davidson/Getty

  • Goalball. Tuncay Karakaya of Turkey in action

    Photograph: Lisi Niesner/Reuters

  • Egypt’s Ibrahim Elhusseiny Hamadtou plays table tennis against Hong’s Kyu Park

    Photograph: OIS/Bob Martin/Rex/Shutterstock

  • Aliaksei Talai during the men’s 100m backstroke final

    Photograph: John Walton/PA

  • Wheelchair basketball. Mayumi Tsuchida of Japan in action

    Photograph: Athit Perawongmetha/Reuters

  • Brazil’s Esthefany Rodrigues leaves the arena after swimming in the women’s 200m freestyle S1 heats

    Photograph: Joel Marklund/AP

  • Britons Adam Duggleby and Steve Bate after winning silver in the cycling pursuit

    Photograph: Alex Whitehead/SWpix.com/Rex/Shutterstock

  • Jesse Reynolds of Team New Zealand reacts after his men’s 400m freestyle – S9 heat

    Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos/Getty

  • School pupils watch the action

    Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos/Getty

  • The wheelchair of New Zealand’s Tainafi Lefono during the wheelchair rugby

    Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos/Getty

  • Cristopher Tronco of Mexico prepares to start swimming the men’s 100m backstroke

    Photograph: OIS/Joel Marklund/Rex/Shutterstock

  • Wheelchair fencing, women’s sabre individual, category B gold medal bout. Olena Fedota of Ukraine in action against Shumei Tan of China

    Photograph: Marko Đurica/Reuters

  • Rowan Crothers of Team Australia reacts after his men’s 50m freestyle win

    Photograph: Naomi Baker/Getty

  • Dame Sarah Storey of Great Britain on her way to setting a new world record

    Photograph: David Fitzgerald/Sportsfile/Getty
